ack.title: Data accessibility
ack.p: All data and computer code used in the analyses reported here are available as supporting information (Appendix S2) as well as on Dryad http://datadryad.org/resource/doi:10.5061/dryad.dn433 (Evans etÂ al. 2016). Please follow the instructions in the README.txt file in the supplement to get started.
